name: Rift Split (20/21)
description:
RIFT SPLIT

A game made by:
Oscar and André
Buskerud Folkehøgskole 20/21

How to play:
Ancestor (Player1, left side) uses WASD to move, E to interact, Q to drop an item, and F to attack

Descendant (Player2, right side) uses the left, right, up and down arrow keys to move, Keypad1 to interact, Keypad2 to drop an item, and Keypad3 to attack

The game can be reset by pressing P

Rift Split is a game which takes place on the same place at different points in time, and 2 players play as the differect characters at those points in time.
The Ancestor is a fallen king, needing to escape from the kingdom before enemy guards find and kill him. The Descendant is an offspring from the king's lineage, who lives life as an explorer. He is now stuck in the old ruins of the kingdom, and must find a way out.
